main event: A UFO sighting was reported on 12 October 1957 in Bellwood, Nebraska, involving a single object that gradually faded in color and emitted no sound.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 3-5 minutes,The observed object was described as the size of a BB and had an orangish-yellow color,The report suggests the sighting could be classified as a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical object,There was insufficient information to make a proper evaluation,The location of the sighting was in Bellwood, Nebraska.
